mapper.select: select DEP_NAME , INSTRUMENT , HEDGE_FLAG , VOLUME , TRUNOVER , CLOSE_TODAY_VOLUME , CLOSE_TODAY_TRUNOVER from V_CTPTRADE_DALIAN where TRADE_MONTH = #{tradeDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select TRADE_MONTH , INVESTOR_NO , INVESTOR_NAME , INSTRUMENT , HEDGE_FLAG , VOLUME , TRUNOVER , CLOSE_TODAY_VOLUME , CLOSE_TODAY_TRUNOVER , EXCHANGE_CHARGE, CLOSE_TODAY_EXCHANGE_CHARGE from V_CTPTRADE_INVESTOR_DALIAN where TRADE_MONTH= #{tradeMonth,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select a.TRADE_MONTH,a.INVESTOR_NO,a.INVESTOR_NAME,a.INSTRUMENT,a.HEDGE_FLAG,a.VOLUME,a.TRUNOVER,b.CLOSE_TODAY_VOLUME,b.CLOSE_TODAY_TRUNOVER,a.EXCHANGE_CHARGE,b.CLOSE_TODAY_EXCHANGE_CHARGE from (select substr(t.TRADE_DATE,0,6) as TRADE_MONTH ,t.INVESTOR_NO,t.INVESTOR_NAME , regexp_replace(t.INSTRUMENT,'[[:digit:]]','') as INSTRUMENT, t.HEDGE_FLAG, sum(t.VOLUME) as VOLUME,sum(t.TRUNOVER) as TRUNOVER ,sum(t.EXCHANGE_CHARGE) as EXCHANGE_CHARGE from T_CTPTRADE_DATA t where t.exchange_name = '大商所' and t.TRADE_DATE >= #{0} and t.TRADE_DATE <= #{1} group by substr(t.TRADE_DATE,0,6),t.INVESTOR_NO,t.INVESTOR_NAME , regexp_replace(t.INSTRUMENT,'[[:digit:]]',''),t.HEDGE_FLAG) a left join (select substr(t.TRADE_DATE,0,6) as TRADE_MONTH,t.INVESTOR_NO,t.INVESTOR_NAME , regexp_replace(t.INSTRUMENT,'[[:digit:]]','') as INSTRUMENT, t.HEDGE_FLAG, sum(t.VOLUME) as CLOSE_TODAY_VOLUME,sum(t.TRUNOVER) as CLOSE_TODAY_TRUNOVER,sum(t.EXCHANGE_CHARGE) as CLOSE_TODAY_EXCHANGE_CHARGE from T_CTPTRADE_DATA t where t.exchange_name = '大商所' and t.offset_flag = '平今' and t.TRADE_DATE >= #{0} and t.TRADE_DATE <= #{1} group by substr(t.TRADE_DATE,0,6),t.INVESTOR_NO,t.INVESTOR_NAME , regexp_replace(t.INSTRUMENT,'[[:digit:]]',''),t.HEDGE_FLAG) b on a.INVESTOR_NO = b.INVESTOR_NO and a.instrument = b.instrument and a.HEDGE_FLAG = b.HEDGE_FLAG and a.TRADE_MONTH = b.TRADE_MONTH
